definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
official records/grade (of goods)/file/records/shelves/slot/gap/crosspiece/classifier for crosspieces/classifier for events, affairs etc/Taiwan pr. [dang3]

sentences.english: This commodity sells very well, it went out of stock in just a few days.
sentences.chinese: 這種商品賣得太快，幾天的工夫就脫檔了。
